Name: Fallen Spirit
About the game: You awaken in an ancient cavern, illuminated only by an odd, floating crystal. Inside, a wayward spirit slumbers, waiting to be freed... Fallen Spirit is a short, immersive VR experience with an emphasis on puzzle-solving and abstract storytelling. Traverse the abandoned ruins. Move obstacles, solve puzzles. Guide your strange companion to the surface! Estimated playtime: 0.5 hours
